name: INTERGRATION EVENT
description:
A platformer with ghouls. 

Art and Programming by me Alkalii (Aiwi#3581) and Music by the amazing Hamish over at https://hamishsmithers.itch.io/. (THANK YOU! SORRY I FORGOT TO CREDIT YOU IN GAME!!!)

Integration Event follows a novice spark practitioner on the run to a new safe zone. Use your SAM to setup abilities to help you on your way to safety.
